NOOP                            @0
00000000000000000000000000111111

ADDI $1 = $0 + b1010            @100
00100000000000010000000000001010

ADDI $2 = $0 + b1011            @1000
00100000000000100000000000001011

BEQ $2==$1 by 1100(to 11000)    @1100
00010000010000010000000000000010

ADDI $2 = $0 + b1010            @10000
00100000000000100000000000001010

jump to 1100                    @10100
00001000000000000000000000000011

ADD  $3 = $2 + $1               @11000
00000000001000100001100000100000

NOOP                            @11100
00000000000000000000000000111111

********************************************************************************************************************************
NOOP                            @0
00000000000000000000000000111111

ADDI $1 = $0 + b1010            @100
00100000000000010000000000001010

SW $1 => data memory[0]         @1000
10101100000000010000000000000000

LW data memory[0] => $2         @1100
10001100000000100000000000000000

BEQ $2==$1 by 1000 (to 11000)   @10000
00010000010000010000000000000001

jump to 10000                   @10100
00001000000000000000000000000100

NOOP                            @11000
00000000000000000000000000111111

********************************************************************************************************************************
NOOP                            @0
00000000000000000000000000111111

ADDI $1 = $0 + b1010            @100
00100000000000010000000000001010

SW $1 => data memory[0]         @1000
10101100000000010000000000000000

LW data memory[0] => $2         @1100
10001100000000100000000000000000

ADD  $3 = $2 + $1               @10000
00000000001000100001100000100000

NOOP                            @11000
00000000000000000000000000111111
